segments.text: This kitchen drawing captures a moment of everyday life.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight from the window highlights the sink area.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands there, towel in hand, drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's so absorbed, missing the overflow completely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water cascades over the sink edge like a waterfall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle grows at her feet, shiny and reflective.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Behind her, the boy balances on the stool precariously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's grabbing cookies from the jar with one hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl watches eagerly, arm extended.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like they're in their own little world of fun.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinets frame the scene nicely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden path looks serene and green.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she'll notice before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a lively, unexpected snapshot this is.
segments.speaker: PAR
